name: Peter Pan - Wendy Darling
description:
If you like the LoRa, please feel free to share your generated images here and leave a review (or at least a rating) for the sake of motivation and stuff ;D

For usage guidance, look into the About this version box for more information and click on Show more to get all trigger words and combinations (The trigger words in the Details box are a pain to manage).

Please contact me here on civitAi or on Twitter if you want to provide the LoRa in a generation service.

About

Well, Wendy is the byproduct of my previous Tinkerbell Lora, it just happens that now I had the time to train the model.

Training

As I said, this LoRa is the by-product of the Tinkerbell Lora, so I didn't fine-tune my collecting process (for other LoRas I sometimes rewind the video frame perfectly to get exactly the frame I want, but here I just paused and if the frame looked okish, I collected it ^^ Result: 33 pictures for training, which is plenty considering that the only variety Wendy shows is whether she's wearing a feather headband or not... Nevertheless, the result is quite nice :) The only problem: due to the fact that she wears her blue nightgown all the time its a bit harder to put some other clothes on her that are not... blue

modelVersions.name: v1.5
modelVersions.description:
V 1.5 because I forgot to add tags the first times (yes, plural)... 🤦

How to use the LoRa

Basic prompt:

wendy darling, bow, nightgown <lora:wendyDarling_v21:1>

meta.prompt: (masterpiece:1.4), (best qualit:1.4), (high resolution:1.4), nightgown, bow, looking at viewer, light smile, <lora:wendy_darling_v15:1>
meta.negativePrompt: nsfw, EasyNegative, badhandv4, (bad anatomy, worst quality, low quality:1.4), watermark, signature, username, patreon, monochrome, zombie, squinting,
